content.prompt: If Student 2 wanted to change his or her footprint to be more similar to that of Student 1, which of the following actions would he or she choose based on the data given in table 1 ?

choices.label: Using mass transit options when available
Reducing the amount of meat in his or her diet
Moving into a smaller home or an apartment complex
Upgrading his or her electronic devices, such as laptops and cell phones, more often

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
